title: Drawing, "Design for Sofa Bed", 1933–34
medium: Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Sofa bed, back rest with corners of wood to create armrest, to which is attached a two-tiered end table.  The sofa bed rests on two front-to-back blocks.  Lines of backrest and tables are slightly rounded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Sofa Bed", 1933–34.
1933–34. Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2003-15-11.
